import React, { Component } from 'react' import _ from 'lodash' import { BrowserRouter, Route, Link, Switch, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import PonyNote from './PonyNote' import NotFound from './NotFound' import PostList from './PostList' import PostsNew from './PostsNew' import PostShow from './PostShow' import PostEdit from './PostEdit' import LoginForm from './LoginForm' import SignForm from './SignForm' import MainMenu from '../ui/menu' import logos from '../logo.svg' import About from './About' import HomeFeed from './HomeFeed' import Profile from './Profile' import Search from './Search' import { fetchposts } from '../actions/note' import { FaBitcoin, FaPaperPlane, FaPython } from 'react-icons/fa' import {ToastConsumer, ToastProvider, withToastManager} from 'react-toast-notifications' import {connect} from 'react-redux' class BaseLayout extends Component { logout_handler(){ this.props.logout(()=>{ this.props.toastManager.add("You've been logged out.", { appearance: 'error' }) }) } onInputChange(term){ console.log(term) } render () { const { auth: { isAuthenticated, token } } = this.props const videoSearch = _.debounce(() => { console.log('hello') }, 300) const {auth} = this.props console.log(this.props) let { PrivateRoute, logout } = this.props const PageTemplate = ({ children }) => { return (
{children}

) } } function mapStateToProps(state){ console.log(state) return state } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { fetchposts })(withToastManager(BaseLayout))
